mapper.delete: update W_PERSONAL_QUALIFICATION_REGIST set deleted = 1 WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE W_PERSONAL_QUALIFICATION_REGIST SET F_USERID=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, switchs = #{switchs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, F_ACCOUNT=#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_NAME=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_SEX=#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_NATION=#{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_ID_NUMBER=#{ID_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_XL=#{xl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_GRADUATION_SCHOOL=#{graduation_school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_GRADUATION_DATE=#{graduation_date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_POSITIONAL_DEGREE_ONE=#{positional_degree_one,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_POSITIONAL_MAJOR_ONE=#{positional_major_one,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_POSITIONAL_DEGREE_TWO=#{positional_degree_two,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_POSITIONAL_MAJOR_TWO=#{positional_major_two,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_POSITIONAL_DEGREE_THREE=#{positional_degree_three,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_POSITIONAL_MAJOR_THREE=#{positional_major_three,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_CERTIFICATE_TYPE=#{certificate_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_CERTIFICATE_ID=#{certificate_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_CERTIFICATE_DATE=#{certificate_date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_CERTIFIED_ID=#{certified_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_CERTIFICATE_MAJOR=#{certificate_major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_SEND_UNIT=#{send_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_REMARK=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OUT_DATE=#{out_date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_ATTACHMENT=#{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_ISREGIST=#{isregist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_CERTIFICATE_REGIST_ID=#{certificate_regist_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_REGIST_ID=#{regist_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_GET_DATE=#{get_date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_LAST_EFFECTICE_DATE=#{last_effectice_date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_REGIST_MAJOR=#{regist_major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_SEAL_ID=#{seal_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_REGIST_OUT_DATE=#{regist_out_date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_REGIST_SEND_UNIT=#{regist_send_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_LASTED_REGIST_TYPE=#{lasted_regist_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_LASTED_REGIST_DATE=#{lasted_regist_date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_KEEP_EDU_STATUS=#{keep_edu_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_REGIST_REMARK=#{regist_remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_REGIST_ATTACHMENT=#{regist_attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_IN_DATE =#{in_date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_LEARNMAJOR =#{learnMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_TYPE =#{occ_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_CERTIFICATE_ID=#{occ_certificate_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_GET_DATE=#{occ_get_date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_OCC_PERIOD_OF_VALIDITY=#{occ_period_of_validity,jdbcType=DATE}, F_OCC_MAJOR=#{occ_major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_OUT_DATE=#{occ_out_date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_OCC_IN_DATE=#{occ_in_date,jdbcType=DATE}, F_OCC_SEND_UNIT=#{occ_send_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_TYPE_WORK=#{occ_type_work,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_DEGREE_WORK=#{occ_degree_work,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_CONTINE_EDU_COMPLE=#{occ_contine_edu_comple,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_elective=#{occ_elective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_compulsory=#{occ_compulsory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_period=#{occ_period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_REMARK=#{occ_remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_OCC_ATTACHMENT=#{occ_attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_EFFICTIVEDATE=#{effictiveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, F_reg_elective=#{regist_elective,jdbcType=DATE}, F_reg_compulsory=#{regist_compulsory,jdbcType=DATE}, F_reg_period=#{regist_period,jdbcType=DATE}, F_secondMajor=#{regist_secondMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_thirdMajor=#{regist_thirdMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_occ_secondMajor = #{occ_secondMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_regist_date=#{regist_date,jdbcType=DATE} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID,F_USERID,F_ACCOUNT,F_NAME,F_SEX,F_NATION,F_ID_NUMBER,F_XL,F_GRADUATION_SCHOOL,F_GRADUATION_DATE,F_POSITIONAL_DEGREE_ONE,F_POSITIONAL_MAJOR_ONE,F_POSITIONAL_DEGREE_TWO,F_POSITIONAL_MAJOR_TWO,F_POSITIONAL_DEGREE_THREE,F_POSITIONAL_MAJOR_THREE,F_CERTIFICATE_TYPE,F_CERTIFICATE_ID,F_CERTIFICATE_DATE,F_CERTIFIED_ID,F_CERTIFICATE_MAJOR,F_SEND_UNIT,F_OUT_DATE,F_REMARK,F_ATTACHMENT,F_ISREGIST,F_CERTIFICATE_REGIST_ID,F_REGIST_ID,F_GET_DATE,F_LAST_EFFECTICE_DATE,F_REGIST_MAJOR,F_SEAL_ID,F_REGIST_OUT_DATE,F_REGIST_SEND_UNIT,F_LASTED_REGIST_TYPE,F_LASTED_REGIST_DATE,F_KEEP_EDU_STATUS,F_REGIST_REMARK,F_REGIST_ATTACHMENT ,F_IN_DATE,F_LEARNMAJOR,F_period F_reg_period,F_compulsory F_reg_compulsory,F_elective F_reg_elective,F_EFFICTIVEDATE,F_secondMajor,F_thirdMajor FROM W_PERSONAL_QUALIFICATION WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT FROM W_PERSONAL_QUALIFICATION_REGIST WHERE ID=#{id} AND deleted = 0

SELECT F_holder F_NAME,F_holderID F_USERID,ACCOUNT F_ACCOUNT FROM sys_user c RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT F_holderID,F_holder FROM w_cer_bor a,w_personal_seal b WHERE a.certifateId = b.F_seal_num AND b.F_holder = #{userName} ) t ON c.userId = t.F_holderID GROUP BY F_holderID

SELECT ID,F_USERID,F_ACCOUNT,F_NAME,F_SEX,F_NATION,F_ID_NUMBER,F_XL,F_GRADUATION_SCHOOL,F_GRADUATION_DATE,F_POSITIONAL_DEGREE_ONE,F_POSITIONAL_MAJOR_ONE,F_POSITIONAL_DEGREE_TWO,F_POSITIONAL_MAJOR_TWO,F_POSITIONAL_DEGREE_THREE,F_POSITIONAL_MAJOR_THREE,F_CERTIFICATE_TYPE,F_CERTIFICATE_ID,F_CERTIFICATE_DATE,F_CERTIFIED_ID,F_CERTIFICATE_MAJOR,F_SEND_UNIT,F_OUT_DATE,F_REMARK,F_ATTACHMENT,F_ISREGIST,F_CERTIFICATE_REGIST_ID,F_REGIST_ID,F_GET_DATE,F_LAST_EFFECTICE_DATE,F_REGIST_MAJOR,F_SEAL_ID,F_REGIST_OUT_DATE,F_REGIST_SEND_UNIT,F_LASTED_REGIST_TYPE,F_LASTED_REGIST_DATE,F_KEEP_EDU_STATUS,F_REGIST_REMARK,F_REGIST_ATTACHMENT ,F_IN_DATE,F_LEARNMAJOR,F_period F_reg_period,F_compulsory F_reg_compulsory,F_elective F_reg_elective,F_EFFICTIVEDATE,F_secondMajor,F_thirdMajor FROM W_PERSONAL_QUALIFICATION WHERE F_SEAL_ID IS NOT NULL
SELECT FROM W_PERSONAL_QUALIFICATION_REGIST WHERE (switchs is NULL OR switchs = 1) AND deleted = 0 and F_CERTIFICATE_ID = #{certificateId} and F_CERTIFICATE_TYPE = #{certificateType}
mapper.update: update W_PERSONAL_QUALIFICATION set F_account = #{account}, F_sex = #{sex}, F_userId = #{userId}, F_xl = #{education}, F_learnMajor = #{major}, F_graduation_school = #{school} where F_ID_number = #{idNumber}
update W_PERSONAL_QUALIFICATION set F_account = null, F_sex = null, F_userId = null, F_xl = null, F_learnMajor = null, F_graduation_school = null where F_ID_number = #{idNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM W_PERSONAL_QUALIFICATION_REGIST where Id = #{linkId} and deleted = 0
select * from W_PERSONAL_QUALIFICATION_REGIST where F_ACCOUNT = #{account} and deleted = 0 order by F_REGIST_ID desc limit 1

select * from W_PERSONAL_QUALIFICATION_REGIST
deleted = 0 and F_ACCOUNT = #{account} and F_REGIST_ID is not null and F_REGIST_ID != '' and F_SEAL_ID is not null and F_SEAL_ID != ''
